pr_title: MULE-18777: Multiple reconnections of a source must not occur at the same time - Part 2

timeline.bodyText:
bad usage of scheduler:

You're creating a scheduler which you never dispose
All scheduling should be done through the scheduling service
timeline.author: marianogonzalez
marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: you already have a retry scheduler. Why not reuse that one?
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: to create and destroy the scheduler on each use is not a good way of handling the lifecycle
